title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText widget emits a beep sound when SWT.MULTI option is selected. This behavior appears to be unintended.
OB: When I choose the SWT.MULTI option, ControlExampleText emits a beep sound.
EB: I expect that no beep sound should be emitted when I choose the SWT.MULTI option.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText widget.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option from the widget.
3. Observe if the widget emits a beep sound.
